channel.title: Delta How to make NPCS Follow you
channel.description:
Well im trying to make an npc follow my player but i really don't know how to. The farthest i made it so far is for the NPC to attack you and follow you, but i need it just to follow the player.
Would you guys have any idea what to do?
Thanks :D

item.title: Delta How to make NPCS Follow you
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

Like summoning? Just rip parts out of summoning bases, the parts you need

Read full topic
item.source: Delta How to make NPCS Follow you
